Clear R's brain
```{r}
rm(list=ls())
library(dplyr)
library(here)
library(ggplot2)
```

Insert soil data 
```{r}
soil <- read.csv(here("soil_data.csv"))
View(soil)
```
make a scatterplot of the soil data for the SOM_percent column
```{r}
ggplot(soil, aes(x = Field.Name, y = SOM_percent)) + geom_point(size =5)+
xlab("Field Name") 
```
Now lets create a boxplot for the same variable
```{r}
ggplot(soil, aes(x = Field.Name, y = SOM_percent)) + geom_boxplot()+
xlab("Field Name treatment") 

```

Now lets make a histogram of the SOM_percent
```{r}
ggplot(soil, aes(x = Field.Name)) + geom_histogram(binwidth = 15) + facet_wrap(~SOM_percent)
```
